title: Apple: Product Design Lead
subtitle: Global Admin Application Redesign
challenge_body: Led the redesign of a business-critical admin web application used by teams globally at Apple, focusing on streamlining operations while maintaining the highest standards of security and efficiency.
responsibilities_list: Facilitated cross-functional workshops to structure unrefined thoughts into strategic plans;Measurably improved usability through research-driven design;Streamlined design operations and established governance systems;Initiated product migration to a uniform design system;Managed product design sprints through effective requirements gathering
impact_list: Reduced workflow completion time by 40%;Improved user satisfaction scores significantly;Decreased training time for new users by 30%;Established consistent design patterns across the platform

title: IronNet: UX Design Manager
subtitle: Enterprise Security Platform
challenge_body: As the first design hire on the cloud-engineering team, established foundational design standards and systems for IronNet's cybersecurity platform.
responsibilities_list: Recruited and supervised a visual designer for interactive design system;Transformed initial concepts into market-validated prototypes;Pioneered design standards and operations;Established scalable design processes
impact_list: Created company's first comprehensive design system;Improved product development velocity by 45%;Reduced design inconsistencies by 80%

title: Magic Leap: Interaction Design
subtitle: Spatial Computing Innovation
challenge_body: Tasked with defining fundamental interaction paradigms for the Magic Leap 1 spatial computing platform.
responsibilities_list: Defined operating system-level interaction paradigms;Programmed spatial audio simulator in C# with Unity;Prototyped hand-gestural input experiences;Created innovative user interaction models
impact_list: Successfully implemented new interaction paradigms;Enhanced spatial computing experience;Improved user engagement metrics

title: Petal: Brow Click Interface
subtitle: Brain-Computer Interface Innovation
challenge_body: Developed novel systems and methods for brainwave data analysis and utility in human-computer interaction.
responsibilities_list: Created custom research-grade instrumentation;Developed AI-training software and APIs;Built robust intellectual property portfolio;Led team of engineers and scientists
impact_list: Successfully licensed technology to leading companies;Adopted by researchers globally;Established new standards in neurotechnology

title: Petal: Metrics Dashboard
subtitle: Advanced Data Visualization
challenge_body: Created sophisticated visualization systems for complex neurological data analysis and research applications.
responsibilities_list: Designed intuitive data visualization interfaces;Created real-time analysis tools;Developed comprehensive reporting systems;Integrated machine learning capabilities
impact_list: Enabled breakthrough research findings;Accelerated data analysis workflows;Improved research productivity
